about_the_game:
This game requires a mouse

Unfold the puzzle composed of blocks


This game requires you to make cuts along the edges of a cube-based puzzle and unfold it into a plane that meets the specified conditions.

To unfold the puzzle into a single plane requires advanced spatial awareness skills.

Unexpected shapes will challenge you and force you to be creative.

Experience this new and authentic puzzle game sensation!

Unfold into a plane that meets the conditions!


Some puzzles have specific clear conditions.

Cutting and unfolding to meet these conditions increases the difficulty, providing a satisfying puzzle stage.

160 puzzles to tackle!


The game offers 160 puzzles officially, making for a very substantial experience.

To tackle all the puzzles, you'll need to clear each stage one by one.

However, even if you're not a puzzle expert, you can still enjoy the ending. The high-difficulty puzzles are designed for advanced players, so don't worry.

Create your own puzzles!


This game allows you to share your custom-made puzzles using the Steam Workshop feature.

By using this feature, you can play puzzles created by others or your friends.

Please ensure that the titles and descriptions for your custom puzzles comply with the Steam Workshop terms of service and do not violate public order and morals.

Video Distribution Guidelines

- Regardless of whether you are an individual or a corporation, you can stream without a license.
- Monetization is only allowed using the features provided by the video streaming sites.
- It would be appreciated if you could include the game's name in the video or stream title and link to the Steam page in the description or similar sections.


Furthermore, we bear no responsibility for any damages resulting from streaming videos of this game.
※The contents of this guideline are subject to change without notice.

This game requires a mouse

Unfold the puzzle composed of blocks


This game requires you to make cuts along the edges of a cube-based puzzle and unfold it into a plane that meets the specified conditions.

To unfold the puzzle into a single plane requires advanced spatial awareness skills.

name: siX Planes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Unfold the cube-based puzzle to meet the conditions! You can also share your custom puzzles on the Workshop!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
